On this day in 1865, General Gordon Granger rode into #Galveston, Texas & delivered a proclamation that continues to ring loud & clear throughout the course of our nation's history to the present: the abolishment of slavery and emancipation for all. #Juneteenth #FreedomDay https://twitter.com/NMAAHC/status/1009061990810218496 QT @NMAAHC #OTD in 1865, enslaved African Americans were notified of their freedom by Union troops in Galveston Bay, TX. Known as #Juneteenth, this day is widely celebrated as the end of chattel slavery in the U.S. Learn more: https://nmaahc.si.edu/blog-post/celebrating-juneteenth #APeoplesJourney #ANationsStory http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/876911152986456065/pu/img/vvUTOExY-_6WjZw_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/876911152986456065/pu/vid/320x180/MNSvKXevvtUveezD.mp4
